text: niyata vasayenma allahge sannidhanayehi (bara ganu læbu) dharmaya islamayayi. dharmaya pahala karanu læbuvan, (meyayi satya dharmaya yana) gnanaya ovunta læbunu pasuda, taman atara æti irsyave hetuvenma (meyata) venaskam dækvuha. ebævin (mese) kavurun allahge ayavan pratiksepa karannoda, (ovunta vinasayayi. ovunge) gananaya nirnaya kirimehi allah itamat sighravantayeki
